summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a combat scene from a video game, featuring a player character engaged in battle with multiple enemies. The environment is an outdoor area with a stone-paved ground and wooden structures in the background. The player character is wielding a glowing staff or weapon, and there are several enemies, some with visible health bars above their heads, indicating they are targets. The user interface displays various icons and meters, including health and stamina bars at the bottom left, and ability or item icons on the bottom right. A text at the bottom center reads "Commander Beedle," suggesting a boss or significant enemy encounter. The right side of the screen shows numerical values for "Will," indicating a resource or currency being accumulated during the fight.
